title: Intro
description: Information is one of the most valuable assets of a company. If it falls into the wrong hands, this can have far-reaching, business-damaging consequences. A functioning Information Security Management System (ISMS) according to the ISO/IEC 27000 series systematically protects the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of company-owned information and data

title: Significance of Information and Operational Security
description: Significance of Information and Operational Security
